content.rendered:
JULY 2025

Message

cover story

UPDATES

in focus 1

in focus 2

in focus 3

civic driven change

partnerships

in the news

Partnerships

Aditya Birla Capital Foundation

Supported healthcare for undeserved communities through two new mobile healthcare units in Ahmednagar and Aurangabad, Maharashtra.

Allianz Technology India

Supported Smile Foundation’s skill training for employability programme, enabling livelihood support for underserved youth in BFSI sector.

Anunta Technology Management Services Ltd

Supported the welfare of underserved children and families across India by partnering with Smile Foundation.

Ashirvad

Supported the upskilling initiative for plumbers – Plumber Saathi, and healthcare for underserved communities through a mobile health unit in Bhiwadi, Rajasthan.

Avantor Foundation

Supported healthcare for undeserved communities through new mobile healthcare unit in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu.

AVI Oil India Pvt Ltd

Supported Smile Foundation’s Foundational Literacy & Numeracy (FLN) and STEM learning initiatives for underserved children in Ballabhgarh, Haryana.

Benepik

Supported the welfare of underserved children and families across India by partnering with Smile Foundation through listing on their reward platform.

Borges India Limited

Extended support towards establishment of STEM Lab under Smile Foundation’s Education programme in Siddharthnagar, Uttar Pradesh.

Brevo

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide support for education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Brightly Software (A Siemens Company)

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide support for education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

British Council Education India Pvt Ltd

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide support for education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Cargill India

Extended support towards strengthening school infrastructure to support education of underserved children in Nellore, Andhra Pradesh.

Children International

Extended support towards an integrated community project in Shahbad Dairy, Delhi, to improve learning and well-being of children and youth.

Clifford Chance Business Services

Provided support for refurbishment of Primary Health Centre in Wayanad, Kerala, under Smile Foundation’s Disaster Response programme.

CNH Industries

Extended support towards Smile Foundation’s Education programme and mobile healthcare programme in Gurugram, Haryana, and Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh.

Dahua Technology

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide support for education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Deutsche Telekom Digital Labs

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide support for education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Draup Business Solutions Pvt Ltd

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to support the education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Dynata

Supported Smile Foundation’s skill training for employability programme, enabling livelihood support for underserved youth in Hyderabad, Telangana, and Noida, Uttar Pradesh.

Emirates

Through the ‘Airkrafted Kids’ initiative, Emirates took a significant step towards inclusive learning and brighter tomorrows with dreams that take flight, empowering 400 children and their families.

Everest Blower Systems Private Limited

Extended support towards mental wellbeing of children under Smile Foundation’s Education programme in Delhi NCR.

Evonik India Private Limited

Extended support towards establishment of 4 STEM Labs under Smile Foundation’s Education programme in Mumbai, Maharashtra.

Grant Thornton

supported Smile Foundation’s skill training for employability programme, enabling livelihood support for underserved youth in Delhi NCR.

KPI Partners India Pvt Ltd

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to support the education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Mars and Wrigley Foundation

Joined hands with Smile Foundation for refurbishment of Anganwadi Centre in Pune, Maharashtra, under the women empowerment programme.

Megmeet Electrical India

Supported Smile Foundation’s healthcare programme for underserved communities through multiple health camps in Delhi NCR.

Mitsubishi Electric Automotive India Pvt Ltd

Supported healthcare for undeserved communities through mobile healthcare unit in Manesar, Haryana.

Near Intelligence Pvt Ltd

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to support the education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Puri Crawford Insurance Surveyors & Loss Assessors India Pvt Ltd

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to support the education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Sarovar Hotels

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide support for education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Seclore Technology Private Limited

Supported the welfare of underserved children and families across India by partnering with Smile Foundation.

ShipRocket

Supported the welfare of underserved children and families across India by partnering with Smile Foundation.

OMG Digital India Private Limited

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide support for education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Oxy Ventures

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide support for education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Paytm

Empowered underserved children and families across India through transformative initiatives in partnership with Smile Foundation.

Pernod Ricard India Foundation

Supported healthcare for undeserved communities through new mobile healthcare unit in Kamrup, Assam.

Sparkle Gift Cards

supported SMile Foundation through their unique #GiftAPurpose initiative, inspiring giving towards social causes aligned with SDGs through gift cards.

Tangerine Skies

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide support for education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

TK Elevator India

Joined hands to support the Entrepreneurship Development initiative under Smile Foundation’s women empowerment programme.

Trianz Digital Consulting Pvt Ltd

Supported Smile Foundation’s Pink Smile mobile health initiative to combat anaemia and malnutrition among women and children.

Valuetree Ingredients Pvt Ltd

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide support for education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative.

Wrigley India Pvt Ltd

Joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide support for education of underserved children under the Every Child in School initiative

Zimmer Biomet India

Extended support towards education for underserved children by facilitating solar-powered digital learning and interactive learning resources.

Zouk

Supported education and welfare of girl children under Smile Foundation’s She Can Fly initiative by contributing part proceeds from sale of their special collection ‘Power Potli’.

Sign Up For Smilescapes

Get monthly newsletter updates

161 B/4, 3rd Floor, Gulmohar House, Yusuf Sarai Community Centre, New Delhi-110049
